Desc.entry: A community allotment run by Darnall Wellbeing (see separate entry) which encourages all local community members to come and participate in the maintenance, growing and harvesting sessions held at the allotment. The site includes a large polytunnel, raised beds and an orchard providing organic growing opportunities for all ages. Working on the allotment is designed to help participants learn about health and nutrition, organic growing and serve as a form of occupational therapy and an aid to improving mental health.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues at 10am, 1.30-4pm (horticultural and therapeutic support sessions), 4-6pm (allotment school)
